Posts.Content: Dec 28, 2018 12:03PM Hlarson wrote: Thanks Susan. Yes I have an amazing support system and medical team. I have known these realities were coming for a long time. Gonna enjoy as I go though!
Posts.Title: New Mets found on liver and lung Mets larger Hlarson pajim

Posts.Content: Dec 28, 2018 02:18PM Hlarson wrote: hi. Yes I to am at the end of the meds list. I tried navelbine but had an allergic reaction. If the Citoxin doesn’t work I think there is Doxol left and then I am on to recycling. Your meds list looks like mine. I didn’t take the time to list all of the Mets I have had over the years. There have been several but in 2016 other organs were involved. Lungs and now liver. Hopefully this will back off the progression a little. I pray you stay well in the new ywar
Posts.Title: New Mets found on liver and lung Mets larger Hlarson pajim

Posts.Content: Hlarson wrote: I have had Mets since 2008 in my bones in various places. 2016 DX lung Mets. Today lung Mets larger and new lesion on my liver. I have been on most meds and the cancer is breaking through. One is going to put me on pill form of Cytoxin. Anyone have experience with that kne My blog: Silver Lining Day Dx 10/24/1999, IDC, Right, 1cm, Stage IV, ER+, HER2- Surgery 10/30/1999 Lumpectomy Surgery 12/8/1999 Mastectomy: Right Chemotherapy 1/7/2000 AC + T (Taxotere) Log in to post a reply
